Summary: HUGE BLACK TRIANGLE, BIG BRIGHT LIGHT,OBJECT FLYING SLOWLY
divs: sighting detailsi always look up the sky, everyday ,1 to 2 hours during the night. i know the stars and how an airplane looks like in the dark. well, i was sleeping in my bedroom, with the window open. i always look up the sky when i woke up in the midle of the night. this happened around 4:45 am 9\27\13; so, 5 to 8 minutes after i woke up i saw this super bright light, and i said to myself "i've never seen that star,it is so bright and big". i dindt want to believe what i was seeing, that was not an airplane or something like that, there was no sound of anything... the only thing i could hear was the crickets... i didnt know what it was. then i saw, it was moving! and at this moment i got scared. it was flying slowly (10-20mph), it kept coming closer, brighter and brighter... i stare at it for like 3 minutes until it passed over my head. as it was passing over, i could see this huuuge.... black... triangle... no sound ,flying slowly over my head; then i couldnt see more because it went over my building. i never , ever in my life had seen such thing like that, ever. and i didnt want to see stuff like that, i dont like it.. i was so scared, i got in bed, under my blanket.. , i text to a friend for like 5 min, then my phone dindt have signal.. idk if that "thing" flying over had something to do.
